name: Gregory STAGLIANO and Marcella Stagliano, H/W, Petitioners v. ROBERT BRUCE DESIGNS, INC., Respondent
name_abbreviation: Stagliano v. Robert Bruce Designs, Inc.

parties: Gregory STAGLIANO and Marcella Stagliano, H/W, Petitioners v. ROBERT BRUCE DESIGNS, INC., Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 2nd day of December 2009, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED. The Application for Leave to File Supplemental Brief is also DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
985 A.2d 217
Gregory STAGLIANO and Marcella Stagliano, H/W, Petitioners v. ROBERT BRUCE DESIGNS, INC., Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 2, 2009.
